item.title: Why the World Needs Superman
item.description: Is James Gunn’s new feature the best Man of Steel movie ever? Maybe not. But it’s the Superman we could all really use right now. Plus, THR ranks the rest.

item.title: Yes, Superman Has Always Been an Immigration Story
item.description: Accusations that James Gunn has “politicized” Superman come laughably late, as the world’s most famous superhero has always been political, write narrative strategist Andrew Slack and Pulitzer Prize-w
